entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
